definition: to use the tip of another person’s lit cigarette to light one's own
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: The birth of Torch Festival stems from of the ancient Yi people's worshiping of fire.
sentences.chinese: 火把節的誕生始於彝族先民對火的崇拜。

sentences.english: Two daughters of a child is curious about fire, and try to reach out.
sentences.chinese: 二女兒小時候對火很好奇，想伸手去碰。
